title: Comparison between germline and somatic loss-of-function
abstract: Germline  We assessed germline  We studied 49 823 CRC and/or polyp cases from the CORGI study, 100 000 Genomes (100kGP) and UK Biobank (UKB), alongside 165 250 controls. Somatic mutations were analysed in 2722 CRCs. Consistent with the literature, a germline loss-of-function
